enlargeddisplaymode: L: 16.7x, M: 11.8x, S: 8.3x, Panorama Standard: 25.6x, Panorama wide: 38.8x
isosensitivity: AUTO (ISO100-1600), ISO100 to 16000 selectable (in 1EV steps, Recommended Exposure Index)
sceneselection: Portrait, Landscape, Macro, Sports Action, Sunset, Night portrait, Night View, Hand-held Twilight
compatiblestandards: Exif Print, Print Image Matching III, DPOF setting
single: Yes (with or without shooting information, RGB histogram & highlight/shadow warning)
externalpower: Battery charger BC-VW1(supplied), AC Adaptor AC-PW20
dynamicrange: Off, D-Range Optimizer (Auto, Level), Auto HDR (Auto Exposure Diff., Adjustable Exposure Diff.: up to 6EV between 1.0EV to 6EV in 1 EV steps)
sensitivityrange: EV0-20 (ISO100 equivalent, with F2.8 lens attached)
adjustableangle: Up by approx. 90 degrees, down by approx. 45 degrees (from the camera back)
microphone: Built-in stereo microphone or ECM-SST1 attachable to Smart Accessory Terminal
compatibleosusbconnection: Windows(R) XP SP3, Windows Vista(R) 4 SP2, Windows 7 SP1, Mac OS X (v10.3-v10.6)
selftimer: 10/2 sec delay selectable, Cont.: with 10 sec delay, 3/5 exposures selectable
continuousshootingapprox: Continuous mode: max. 3 fps, Speed-priority continuous mode: max 10 fps
recordingformat: JPEG (DCF Ver. 2.0, Exif Ver.2.3, MPF Baseline compliant), RAW (Sony ARW 2.3 format), 3D MPO (MPF Extended compliant)
speaker: Built-in, monaural, Volume settings in 8 steps between 0 and 7
exposuremodes: Programmed AE (iAUTO, P), Aperture priority (A), Shutter-speed priority (S), Manual (M), Sweep Panorama, 3D Sweep Panorama, Anti Motion Blur, Scene Selection
memorystick: Memory Stick PRO Duo / Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo
antidustsystem: Charge protection coating on optical filter and ultrasonic vibration mechanism
imagequalitymodes: RAW, RAW & JPEG, JPEG Fine, JPEG Standard
hdoutput: HDMI mini connector (Type-C), BRAVIA Sync (link menu), PhotoTV HD
focusmodes: Autofocus / DMF (Direct Manual Focus) / Manual Focus selectable
aelock: AE is locked with focus locked
otherfeatures: Tracking Focus, Predictive control, Focus lock, Built-in AF illuminator (Distance: approx. 0.5-3.0m with E 18-55mm F3.5-5.6 OSS)
lcdmonitortype: 7.6 cm (3.0-type) wide type TFT, Xtra Fine LCD with TruBlack technology
longexposurenr: On/Off selectable, available of shutter speeds longer than 1 sec.
focusarea: Multi (25 points) / Center / Flexible spot selectable
modes: Auto WB, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Incandescent, Fluorescent, Flash, C. Temp 2500 to 9900k, C. Filter (G7 to M7 15-step, A7 to B7 15-step), Custom, WB fine adjustment
cameratype: Interchangeable lens digital camera with built-in flash
pictureeffect: Posterization (Color, B/W), Pop Color, Retro Photo, Partial Color (Red, Yellow, Blue, Green), High Contrast Monochrome, Toy Camera, Soft High-key, Soft Focus, HDR Painting, Rich-tone Mono, Miniature
brightnesscontrol: Auto / Manual (5 steps between -2 and +2) / Sunny Weather
shootingmodes: Single-shot, Continuous shooting, Speed-priority continuous shooting, Self-timer, Bracketing
flashmodes: Flash off, Autoflash, Fill-flash, Slow Sync., Rear Sync.
creativestyle: Standard, Vivid, Neutral, Clear, Deep, Light, Portrait, Landscape, Sunset, Night Scene, Autumn Leaves, B/W, Sepia (Contrast, Saturation, Sharpness adjustable in +/-3 steps)
